title: Randomly Disconnecting Every 3 Minutes
body:
I don't know what board to put this in. But basically the past four games of league I have attempted to play have been ruined by this problem. In a nutshell, my internet is perfectly fine, I have 40 ping, and then all of a sudden it will "attempt to reconnect" for 20 seconds or so, go to exactly 500 ping, then it will go back down to 40 ping and I can play. This has been happening every 2 or 3 minutes. At first I thought it was just my internet, but some of my friends are having the exact same problem, and quite a few other people in game have been complaining about it.

I was just wondering if anyone knows about this and/or having the same problem? I just want to know how to fix it so I can go back to playing my favorite game :)

replies.body: Though your internet might appear fine, it can still have problems specifically connecting to our game server.    I suggest going over each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get your settings configured and connection strengthened to stay in game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
